quote_last: In my own rooms, but it was less successful, she seemed to have grown less juvenile, more of a woman overnight.
title: Lolita
author: Vladimir Nabokov

title: The Curious Incident of the Dog in the Night-time
author: Mark Haddon

quote_first: I had a date with her next day at
quote_last: in my own rooms, but it was less successful, she seemed to have grown less juvenile, more of a woman overnight. A cold I caught from her led me to cancel a fourth assignment, nor was I sorry to break an emotional series that threatened to burden me with heart-rending fantasies and peter out in dull disappointment. So let her remain, sleek, slender Monique, as she was for a minute or two
title: Lolita
author: Vladimir Nabokov
